document_data.name: Silkstone Fashions
document_data.mainbody: '''Silkstone Fashions''' was a tailor's shop in [[Athkatla]]'s rich [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Silkstone Fashions was a large shop on the [[Godsmoot]]â€“the street that ended at the famed [[The Crown Aflame]] theater in the Temple District. [[Meir Lane]] ran along the shop's eastern side.
document_data.Services: The shop offered services of a tailor and a wide selection of fashionable accessories for purchase.
